website_summaries.verdict: An expertly crafted ab belt that supports the lower back and is designed for both men and women.
pros: Delivers therapeutic heat that helps accelerate weight loss
Boasts high-quality neoprene construction with anti-slip technology to provide great breathability and shape support
Features ReformerAir technology that protects the back and makes the belt ideal for use during any physical activity
cons: Hook and loop straps sometimes make it tough to  put the belt on and take it off

customer_reviews.title: I like the velcro
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't seem to do anything other than get me hot and sweaty where it is worn. I like the velcro, but it is a huge tab and pulling it off is difficult, overly wears the mating piece, takes some serious arm strength and skill to pull apart. Overall, it is a quality product. It just doesn't do anything other than squeeze me in the middle. Which, isn't bad with some shirts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this a lot just yet but from the times I have worn it...very comfortable, adjustable, and definitely does it's job! I was torn between this and a corset type waist trainer. I'm so glad I bought this instead! Will definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased both
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both this Reformer waist trimmer as well as another which has LUMBAR support. Overall, I'm glad I purchased both. The Reformer waist trimmer supplies exactly what it says-- compression, adjustability, core heat retention, and some support for posture. It's very, VERY flexible, so if you are running or doing any cardio with lots fo overall movement, this will work well for you. If you're looking for something that will also give you lumbar support for lifting, this may not be your BEST bet, though it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Back support and more!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!! I order this belt to give me some back support while working out and it works like a champ! It holds very good while doing all types of exercises and no back pain afterwards. Added bonus, I sweat a bit more because of it so win-win!
customer_reviews.author: smileyheart

customer_reviews.title: Already very impressed & much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it that much to see the benefits or effects of it. However so far I noticed followings: 1) Extremely comfortable, You forget about it being on you in matter of minute 2) Super low profile you can wear easily under your normal cloth. 3) Wearing it for an hour or 2 and because of the support it provides, after taking it off you feel part of your body is missing and you have to have this on to feel right
customer_reviews.author: art...n

customer_reviews.title: This Ab Belt works better than I ever expected
customer_reviews.text: This Ab Belt works better than I ever expected ... talk about exceeding expectations. It is comfortable and the adjustable strap is "one of a kind". I've never seen a closure like it before. I am 76 years young and use this when my back hurts and also to knock off a few pounds easily. I am totally impressed and would recommend it to anyone, young or older. It's always a pleasure to find good products and good service. Thank you so much ... Linda Shaver
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably, Velcro holds well
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably, Velcro holds well..I do hope it was wider to fit upper and lower abs! Especially lower part of stomach..But I have to admit it's helping me with my workout..Thank You Reformer Athletics..If you can make a wider trimmer, I'll be first on line to purchase..Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: R B.

customer_reviews.title: Once I'm a little more comfortable wearing it
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this, and wear it for a few hours a day. I know it's meant to be worn during workouts, but I've been using it during the day more as a waist trainer than trimmer, since I'm trying to get my waist back in shape after babies. Once I'm a little more comfortable wearing it, I'll probably start wearing it during workouts instead of just doing every day stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Joey and Darcy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for working out
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING for working out. Embellishes workout by making you sweat extra. I was impressed with how quickly it shipped/got it next day. I loved it so much I ordered a second and I received it the next day, too. Highly recommend product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: this thing is great. I'd recommend it to friends and family (Though ...
customer_reviews.text: Heat up and sweat it out, this thing is great. I'd recommend it to friends and family (Though I'd make sure Im not trying to tell them their fat).
customer_reviews.author: TheSonicBlader

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It can be detected under clothing but it is not as bulky as the other sweat belts i have used and it is easy to clean. However, if you are a curvy person like me, the belt tends roll up. Also, please be mindful that the red trimming around the belt is not colorfast. When you wash the belt the red color runs and when you sweat, the red color transfers to your clothing especially if you are wearing light colored workout gear. So be careful with that. I didn't know until I washed and perspired in it. Apart from that, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Love this Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am Very please with this i am 6 Foot Tall Weight 260 pounds Been Dieting and taking Hydrocy cut hardcore Elite and running everyone more felt like i need something more this belt was what was missing glad i bought it :D
customer_reviews.author: bigcox6

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The thing I like most about this is the length of it - I have enough to really wrap around me and position perfectly. It’s well made and comfortable to wear - it doesn’t come loose and I like the handy pocket at the front for my phone if needed. After wearing it for almost a week every day, I’m starting to notice my stomach is flatter and my waist slightly more defined.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E Davis

customer_reviews.title: It works, but...
customer_reviews.text: So, unfortunately, I am allergic to the material, but for what it is worth, other than the rash everywhere it was touching my body, it did do its job. My core temperature did rise a bit, I was sweating more, it was comfortable, and the material is strong. It works. If I wasn't allergic, I would gladly use it everyday when I go to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: James Eisert

customer_reviews.title: Best Waist Trimmer & Worth the Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy that I decided to give this waist trimmer a try. I've used other waist trimmers in the past & this one is hands down the best one I've ever used! I have sensitive skin & while a few of the other brands have caused skin irritations, this one doesn't. The velcro closure on the Sweet Sweat waist trimmer is very secure & it fits around the waist without any of the velcro touching my skin. I was skeptical of the sample packet of Sweet Sweat Workout Enhancer, but after using it a couple of times, I purchased a jar for myself. The warming effect & the amount of sweat makes me push even harder!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Goins

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be as described. Sweating is more aroun abdominal area when used.
customer_reviews.text: My wifes seems to like it. She states that it does heat up her core making her sweat more around the abdominal area. She uses it everytime she goes running.
customer_reviews.author: AKKA

customer_reviews.title: Top quality 💪🏾
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, high quality product. I'm really tiny and this wraps around me and stays put. But this will fit any size waist! By far the best waist trainer I've tried. All black everything unlike those other tacky brands that have to make everything in obnoxiously bright colors. Can't workout without it. Trust me, you'll feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: A A

customer_reviews.title: Worst one yet- useless
customer_reviews.text: Soooo, I had a sweet sweat one for well over a year- not a single issue/problem. Only reason I got a new one is the old became too big- cause it was working! This one had great reviews so I decided to try instead of SS. Andddd after about TWO WEEKS of use, it completely disintegrated and is now useless. So going back to sweet sweat. Thanks. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena H.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and strong and sturdy Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I use these belts quiet often, for workout and spinning, and I go through a few a year, I bought this belt for my wife, and she loves it, sturdy and strong and sturdy Velcro, it is very important since these belts constantly move during exercise, I have bought similar belts for a lot more money than this product.It even comes with a cell phone or IPod carrier, that attaches neatly anywhere on the belt, with a strong Velcro, Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Waist Trimmer belt is very comfortable and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I received this Waist Trimmer Belt on time and properly packed. The included instructions for wearing and cleaning the unit were easy to follow. I wear this belt on regular basis for jogging/running; it's very comfortable. It does not feel bulky. The detachable pocket is very practical: It fits my iPhone SE (with case) very nicely. I would recommend this product to anyone interested on active sports or other activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year the inside tore and velcro stopped working ( loose) so belt falls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It also makes crunches harder to execute but that may be a good thing bcus u really work harder for results
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a week and a half... not sure of overall result but it does make u set a lityle more in the area than if not having it on. It also makes crunches harder to execute but that may be a good thing bcus u really work harder for results...so far so good
customer_reviews.author: E.Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it... without it I don't sweat as much when I work out.. but with it I sweat a lot. It's comfortable too
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Get A Smaller Waist And Back Support All In One!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is very well made with quality materials and has a lifetime warranty on material and workmanship. It helps you get a smaller waist by using the heat it creates by wearing it but also has the advantage of supporting your back if you have problems with that. Even wearing it working in the yard or walking can do both. It is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mabie

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is nicely made, the quality is good, but, looking at the guy in the picture, he must be short since the wrap is not that wide for taller people. Fits under shirts discreetly. I don't use the phone pouch, but it might come in handy later. The velcro is nice and wide and sticks well. I would say it would need to be 3 inches wider to have it fit like it does with the guy in the product picture. I stand at a little over 6 feet tall. I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: michael alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This belt makes me sweat so much more than I usually do while running. After my workout, my shirt is soaked! I was skeptical at first about purchasing it, but it was definitely worth it. My favorite thing about it is that it is completely fully adjustable, so as I lose the remaining pounds I can keep using it. This was the failing point of some other belts I've had, so I must say I'm delighted about this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kay28

customer_reviews.title: Great for Back Support
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. I use this for back support and use it for at least 9 hours a day. I use more than average, so in about 3 months the velcro starts giving out. So I stretch it more but it tears apart. So I order a new one. It comes with a warranty but I haven't put in for a replacement cause I use it longer. As far as waist trimming, It does work.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagohawk

customer_reviews.title: My trimmer still looks brand new and the velcro is still sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: REALLY works very well. I've been using this waist trimmer for a few months now and have seen a significant difference in my core. paired with drinking lots of water and working out consistently throughout the week. I would purchase this again. My trimmer still looks brand new and the velcro is still sturdy and works well. :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Helper

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, the red lining did bleed though
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this product. I believe it has made a difference with increased calorie burn and tightening of my belly. I gave it 4 stars because even after hand washing, the red lining stained some of my clothes from sweating during workout. Overall I would recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable,,
customer_reviews.text: The product fits well,,,,I wear it to work for 10 hour shifts,,,,very comfortable,,,,and very handy with the cell phone carrier which was free so overall,,,,,, nice fit and can't wait to use it when I start walking and really start sweating!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve williams

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover your stomach
customer_reviews.text: Not the best I don't really sweat that much even though I put wedding creams and you have a gap by your stomach so it has like a low cut wouldn't recommend purchasing it if I can return it I would but it's too late for me now only good thing about it is that it has the pocket for you to put your phone
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with thus waist trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Waist Trimmer good quality and sturdy,I love the self attached jacket for my cell phone I don't always have pants with pockets and this solves that problem for cell and my keys. Still working on reducing the waist line and this is helping me to achieve my goal.
customer_reviews.author: Delores

customer_reviews.title: Trims your waist by sweating
customer_reviews.text: Well made elastic waist trimmer. Stretches to meet your body size. It makes you sweat for sure. It washes in the laundry well. Just be sure to attach the Velcro to the belt so you don’t get fuzzies from other clothing in it.
customer_reviews.author: JessC

customer_reviews.title: If you are petite this may not be for you
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite person with a smaller torso. This waist trimmer is huge on me. It covers part of my chest as well. I’ve had to make some adjustments to it so that I can wear it. The material is good and latex free. The Velcro holds well .
customer_reviews.author: FranBill

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I Like this trainer Bc it has a place for my phone. When I take the trainer off I can tell by the amount of sweat coming off the trainer that it has done it’s job. You won’t see any results but using this trainer makes me feel better.
customer_reviews.author: esslinj

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these already and I think they work very well. They are easy to wear during the day or night and appear to be remarkably odor resistant. I have similar devices from other vendors but they can't be worn at night. We'll see what long term benefits arise but they definitely provide some moderate amount of lower back support without distressing my organs. My other, stronger devices do impact me internally if I wear them too long or when I lay down. I would recommend this first before you look at more expensive alternatives. The price was very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: JDay

customer_reviews.title: Waist Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with this product. As soon as I got the item, I used it the same night. The product does make you sweat. the instructions are pretty easy to understand. I am not sure if this product will end up making me lose weight, but I will definitely be using it with all my workouts. Quick shipment. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: My trainer asked me to buy a workout belt/wrap to help with support & building my core. I was worried that it would not fit (not be large enough). However, it’s perfect. It will go with me through my weight loss and fitness journey. Cannot recommend this product enough. Buy it!! You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to sweat
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. I actually wore it to work for 8 hours I walk 95% of my shift. The band was full of sweat pretty gross actually lol but nice to know it works. And the phone pocket fit my S9 with a case perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Finesse W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best workout products I've ever bought so far. Great partner in workouts! I tried to buy other similar product when there was a time it got out-of-stock. Unfortunately, I didn't like that one. So it was great when it became available again. Bought it for the 3rd time!!! I might post the result of what I've been working on in the future. ;) Kudos folks! I love your product.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Start using it for my workout and found ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Start using it for my workout and found it works great for my back support. Had an issue with the product but contact seller and they took care of the issue right away! Highly recommend this product for a great workout and support of your back!
customer_reviews.author: Manitoy

customer_reviews.title: So good! I purchased this a month ago and it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, So good! I purchased this a month ago and it works ten time better than other waistbands. I sweat more and I'm starting to see results. It's beginning to wrap around my waist! I tend to wear it all day and into my workouts for maximum results and the shake booklet is a plus. If you are consistent and commit to high intensity workout several times a week you will see results.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Exercise after lipo
customer_reviews.text: About 9 weeks ago I had tumescent liposuction done. When I tried to run I felt a constant stinging sensation every time I took a step. I'm required to wear a compression garment for an additional month, but the garment is uncomfortable during exercise. This belt took care of all of that! The compression alleviated the pain so I could continue with my training. The belt never slid down or puckered and it's surprisingly comfortable. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product,
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, you can definitely feel & see the results I travel a lot & I am even using it on the planes for great posture & support It does burn the fat from your waist line
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD LAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it's supposed to do, in that it will make your waist sweat. It that's all you want, then this is great. The only reason I don't give it a 5 star is b/c the removable I-phone pocket is too small for my smart phone. So perhaps on newer version of the belt, you can go to a larger pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After MINIMAL USE THE BELT IS COMING APART!!
customer_reviews.text: ATTENTION UPDATES!!! The belt after minimal use is coming apart ! Poor QUALITY!I must say the product does not make a lot of ridiculous claims TAKE A LOOK AT THE PHOTOS ATTACHED !'
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Well what can i say it works for me kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Well what can i say it works for me kept a few pounds off.it has to be used while doing those core/abdominal crunches..but wear some clothing in between the skin and belt..velpro still holds after a month of use..
customer_reviews.author: krystyne

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! It includes instructions for wearing and cleaning the unit, and were easy to follow. I wear this belt on regular basis for jogging/running; it's very comfortable. It does not feel bulky. The detachable pocket is very practical. I would recommend this product to anyone interested on active sports or other activities.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Helle

customer_reviews.title: I know it's supposed to stretch. But...
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the belt started stretching on the edges. looking weird and not lying flat. If the want my opinion as to a fix - make the Velcro part that holds it on the same width as the belt as to apply the same amount of force across the entire belt.
customer_reviews.author: T Wissner

customer_reviews.title: I really like it because it help to compress my stomach at ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it because it help to compress my stomach at work out for a better result and help you burn fat because it being a Lil bit when you're exercising
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: I love my waist trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I love my waist trimmer! What really makes me happy is the case for the cell phone and it adjustable to move the phone on waist trimmer! I get a good sweat with this belt as well.
customer_reviews.author: MariMom

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy build, yet flexible enough to enjoy working while ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy build, yet flexible enough to enjoy working while wearing the belt. I have run on the treadmill, used the elliptical and lifted weights and have been comfortable. Also like that the belt is wide enough to cover my mid-section without me having to constantly adjust the belt. Lastly, I like that the velcro's width is not the same as the belt's width. With my previous belt the width of the velcro and belt were the same and it was a bit irritating having the velcro scratching my skin.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked it to be wider
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger waist 40 inches. This is the FIRST belt that has fit me with room. I would have liked it to be wider. But it was very nice fabric. did roll down on me a little but was not uncomfortable. I did feel the initial sweating that other ppl commented on. I liked the sweating! This is very nice product and would buy again and I would tell others to buy it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: PJCoolidge

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, comfortable. Have been wearing daily. Hoping this helps to trim the fat, but only time will tell. The phone holder is pretty cool, but my android case doesn't fit it and I'm too lazy to try to take it out of the case to see if the actual phone fits. Would have been great if it was large enough to fit with my protective case on, but really doesn't matter, no need for my phone to be at the hip all the time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Domingo

customer_reviews.title: one of the best belt I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am totally loving it, one of the best belt I have ever purchased. Excellent quality and great customer service from the sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Amt T

customer_reviews.title: ... first waist trimming product I've purchased and I feel like it does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: This is the first waist trimming product I've purchased and I feel like it does what it claims. The only thing is that I do wish it was a bit wider to fit my whole abdomen, but it's not too far off. I like the back support it provides during workouts and the free cell holder is a great bonus. It works as promised and I have noticed, wearing it around the house or for workouts, that it does help minimize excess bloating/H2O weight. Good buy, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this waist trimmer Ab belt was great. The VELCRO adjustment around the waist was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this waist trimmer Ab belt was great. The VELCRO adjustment around the waist was a good fit and it did not become detached while I made movements during my exercise. The adjustable smart phone sleeve was an excellent addition to the belt and it also holds on to the belt very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Highsmith

customer_reviews.title: This is really only for losing water weight (temporary weight loss)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with water weight as I am preparing for a physique competition and it has been a great addition. When i'm doing cardio(walking , running) this thing gets soaked. It also helps my posture when I'm doing weight training. the phone case was a neat little prize too. it is definitely hard to pull the Velcro strip off when you want to take it off/adjust it but i've gotten the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nutes

customer_reviews.title: Came in right when it said it would. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in right when it said it would. I used this for a few day's within the week and I notice a difference, it wasn't much but I could tell my waist was a bit smaller. I mean I'm also eating healthy and working out a bit more so saying that the waist trimmer did that all it self would be a lie but I do think it did help.
customer_reviews.author: Jab Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed and tested many trainers and this one seems to be of the highest quality. I would recommend this over the other belts I've reviewed in the past. A++
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hesterly

customer_reviews.title: Waist Trimmer Belt
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of belt before but this one exceeds anything I've had previously. Having delivered extremely quickly was an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: J. Frank Nash

customer_reviews.title: Feels GREAT immediately out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item a few minutes ago. Open the box and put it on! It immediately alleviated my back pain. Now understand this is not a miracle device, but the support it gave was perfect for my ailments. I actually bought this item to try to reduce my excess 'flab' on my waist when exercising. I specifically bicycle approximately 50-75 miles/week and experience back pain and I am hoping this waist belt will both help with the back strain as well as tone my waist - So far, feels wonderful
customer_reviews.author: GNC1226

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice support and heat strapping for back and stomach. Like this product a lot. My son has it now so I have buy me another one.lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far loving this waist trimmer, I have used it every day since I got it 4 days ago. Comfortable, supportive and doesn't move once placed in position and certainly helps the sweat factor! The velcro allows for a large area of adjustment. Comes with a detachable phone carrier which personally I find useless but others may find it useful. I wear it while on the the treadmill along with my ankle and wrist weights. The only thing keeping it from 5 stars at this point is seeing if it really helps reduce my extra belly.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Lillie

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months of use, it broke along the ...
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I got a replacement and so far so go, almost 2 months of on and off use. Let see how much this one last. Thanks for the replacement. After 4 months of use, it broke along the Velcro even after following the care instructions shipped with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit! Incredibly sleek and non obtrusive design. Super simple and easy to adjust to your waist size. I absolutely love the smartphone sleeve and my iPhone 6s fits in it perfectly. The included instructions are simple and straightforward and give good details on how to use and care for the product. I've only had it for about two weeks but can already say I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, quality product and It has a smart phone holder that easily attaches to the waist trimmer as well. So far so good 😊 Lovin' it 😉
customer_reviews.author: R. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: It really does help you work up a butt load of sweat around my belly. I don't care for abs but my "love gut" will be slimmer!
customer_reviews.author: TDDYGNG

customer_reviews.title: I was sweating like a monkey
customer_reviews.text: I was sweating like a monkey!! This is exactly what I needed to get better results. Thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Ab belt trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt, i tried it out on a 30 min run and when i took it off i was drenched in sweat. The belt is very well made and the material is skin friendly. A great belt for the buck. THANKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I just got it today so I've only used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today so I've only used it once. This is exactly what I wanted though. I wanted something to make my stomach sweat. I wore it over my t-shirt during my workout and when I took it off my stomach was much more sweaty than usual. Hopefully things keep going this way.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Sweat baby, sweat!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a whole different work out with this belt. Very comfortable and easy to put on and off. Holds the body and helps keep the core tight during a work out. I'm starting slow, and this is really helping me walk straighter and burn more.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t want to be without this !
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 Stars because ... I LOVE this waist trimmer. It is working ! My waist is getting smaller. You must be diligent in wearing it. Another reason why I love it is because it helps tremendously for my Posture It is very comfortable. If something happened to this, I’d be very sad. I’d definitely order this same one.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product and a great buy. I held on to my old one because made by Gold's gym till it feel apart. After seeing this product with a new phone pouch as i got tired of stuffing my phone down the top of my old one, i was pleased tonsee those days were over. Not to mention the involvement from the owners of the company
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Covers up the fupa
customer_reviews.text: Idk that’s what my girl said. She loves it and bought one for her working out and one for daily use
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: My 1st waist trimmer. Used few days and I feel progressive. But after few days my belly started to scratch for few hours for some reason. I will try again and continue and see the result
customer_reviews.author: irfan dharma

customer_reviews.title: Keep belt decently firm at comfortable position.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great will sweat like product says notice the tighter it gos more you will so far product does what it says seller came pakaged nice and will be getting some other items from seller..
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Warnick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only have used this once so far, but sure did produce the sweat. Very comfortable and I like the phone holder as well. Time will tell if it holds up on the quality end, but from the other reviews I've read, sounds like this will not be an issue. I received this 4 days ago and already the seller has emailed me twice asking how I like it and if it's working for me, so I believe if there were an issue, they would be willing to work it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, immediately once you put it on you feel your core area heating up. Giving you that sauna feel, I feel like I workout pretty hard but with this thing on you sweat!! Easy to maintain and easy clean up after use, love this waist trimmer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wale Akintunde

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have considered buying one for a long time and chose this one because of the reviews and price. I have been pleasantly surprised by how comfortable the waist trainer is. It is an excellent value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Great for all sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I do love this belt! I have bought a few over the last several years and this one works just as well, but for some reason can almost wrap around me twice! (I'm not that skinny either!) It's just a big belt! I guess I'm getting double the wrap, which may be why I sweat a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: LSolly

customer_reviews.title: i do like it
customer_reviews.text: Makes you sweat, which is the main use i think. the whole "get you ripped thing" i think is an overhype. i do like it though
customer_reviews.author: Veronica N.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for my needs. As a type 1 diabetic I have things plugged in to my sides an abdomen. I got tired of loosing $45 sensors hours after they were inserted this product holds everything securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hassman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: The red trim bleeds out onto your skin and clothes and the edges roll in making it a pain to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome waist trainer!!!
customer_reviews.text: In case your wondering if it works, it does! I've used these type of waist trainers throughout my whole weight loss journey and this is by far my favorite one that I've purchased. It's not bulky & the tab to secure it makes it easy to adjust. It doesnt role too much either. Most importantly it does its job as you can tell from the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Nay6211

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! Provide great support for my back during a workout and the velcro stays put! That was my biggest problem with another brand I had purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I noticed increased perspiration on my midsection whenever i take ...
customer_reviews.text: I noticed increased perspiration on my midsection whenever i take it out after exercise, however i am yet to see the effects on reducing my waist size. It also helps with back support.
customer_reviews.author: Ritzy

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ this second order
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤️ this second order.. if you used it has directed you will see result I did...I lost at least 3 inches from my waist in a month just by wearing it during my days at work
customer_reviews.author: Sexyt302

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! Nice look!! Fits great and able to move freely!!
customer_reviews.author: William Garrison

customer_reviews.title: I have had this belt for a while and found ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this belt for a while and found it very helpful. This new belt is not manufactured as the previous one. The finished stitch is not professionally done.
customer_reviews.author: vishopper

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and has multiple benefits
customer_reviews.text: I've started handling heavier weight and wanted this product for lower back support. It delivers in that as well as keeping your lower back muscles warm during your workout. It is a great product and has multiple benefits, waist training, back support and increased perspiration. Love this product. Will be using it all the way through my training for competition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt
customer_reviews.text: Works well...great support...customer support has been awesome...lifetime warranty, can’t get much better then that
customer_reviews.author: Edward Yang

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and looks good on
customer_reviews.text: I began sweating almost as soon as I put it on. It is easy to put on and fits comfortably. It is also fashionable looking. The phone pocket is a nice additional touch. It is very easy to clean. You look trimmer as soon as you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product made very well and all materials are top notch. I still have this item and still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Onyon

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the phone case was more stretchy to fit my phone (I have a Galaxy S7). Great support when working out. it does kind of loses shape after a couple uses. I need to roll it up so it goes back to its regular flat shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ella_Bella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about a week now and so far so good. There is plenty of room whether you are big or small and it's comfortable to wear. The only suggestion I have is the Velcro clasp should be a softer material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this for every workout since I received it. It definitely seems to be doing as it says. The only complaint I have is that it is starting to roll up at the bottom and the top and just getting a little stretched out of shape. I am a female and my waist is kind of small, so I do have to pull it really tight. This may be the cause. Hopefully this will not get any worse in the future. But for now it is making me sweat off the extra water weight in that area and helping me get that six pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I used this trainer for the first time today and love the width, felt like it covered all my problem areas that I want to focus on. Stays in place and made of nice material. I recommend this product if ur looking for a comfortable waist trainer.
customer_reviews.author: PoliceGirl216

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my weight loss journey. It's nice and firm with great material. Highly recomend it. I use it almost everyday and it really last me a long time. No wear and tear. The velcro material is also pretty neat. Check it out for yourself. I can only type so much. Seeing is believing. 55lbs down and still going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent waist belt and does add support for my back; arrived very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick A. Bell

product_meta.title: Waist Trimmer Belt for Women and Men, Ab Trainer, Slim Body Sweat Wrap for Low Back and Lumbar Support with Sauna Suit Effect, Abdominal Waist Corset Trainer for Calories Burn with Smartphone Sleeve
feature_bullets: THERAPEUTIC HEAT will accelerate calories burn and will create a portable sauna around your waist, by increasing circulation in abdominal area and by stimulating toxins loss during fitness activity;

PROTECT and REDUCE THE RISK OF INJURY: It is recommended for victims of back and spine trauma. If you find yourself having regular back pains, poor posture or just a really bad pain at the end of the work day, Reformer Adjustable Waist Trimmer Ab Belt will give you the extra support you need to stand up straight by removing the pressure on your back and relieving sore muscles and arthritis;

CUSHIONS, COMPRESS AND SUPPORTS LOWER BACK by improving posture and providing instant abdominal compression and lumbar support; Because of its new technology and design, Reformer Waist Trimmer Ab Belt gives you the possibility to walk, run, cycle or even do yoga and burn calories by maximizing and preserving body heat in the abdominal area;

NO SMELL AND NO SLIPPING. Reformer Waist Trimmer Ab Belt is made of new high quality three-dimensional structure neoprene with an anti-slip technology, with great breathability and shape support; Adjustable Velcro closure fitting waist from 25'' to 44''.

3 UNIQUES BONUSES: Fully Adjustable Velcro Smartphone Neoprene Sleeve (iPhone X & 11 compatible) + The Healthy eBook of Detox SMOOTHIES & Protein SHAKES (33 Unique Recipes for busting your Fitness Journey and finally get the killer ABS that you worked for!) + Not Another Diet Book (good nutrition is the key to a long life); If you are not satisfied with the results, we provide full refund, so either your like it or it's on us;
